doc.field: David N. Judelson papers on Gulf and Western Industries
David N. Judelson papers on Gulf and Western Industries
Gulf + Western securities, compensation plans, etc. (box 1 of 2)
Gulf + Western securities, compensation plans, etc. (box 1 of 2)

This box and the next holds files related to various G+W compensation plans that Judelson was a participant in, including executive compensation, deferred compensation, stock options & purchases, incentive compensation, and retirement plans. Related in part to these plans, the files also hold information about G+W stock and bond securities (e.g., tender offers, dividends, stock purchase offers, shareholder meeting announcements, earnings, proxies, securities prospectus, etc.). This first box also holds information about Judelson's participation in these plans and his related SEC disclosures. Also in this box are G+W Foundation financial statements for 1975-80.
